analysis.key_quote: The removal of documents along with the absolute gutting of the Civil Service and firing Inspectors General is a terrifying sequence of events, unconstitutional at best and fascist at worst.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the gutting of the Civil Service and the unconstitutional nature of the actions described, which aligns with themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
